trans-unit.source: Defines a way to expose a custom <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor"></xref> object to a cache implementation.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en måte å vise en egendefinert <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor"> </xref> -objekt til en buffer implementering.

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET, the IFileChangeNotificationSystem interface provides access to internal file-change notification management.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittet IFileChangeNotificationSystem gir tilgang til interne filendring meldinger håndteres i ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The IFileChangeNotificationSystem interface is used internally by the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittet IFileChangeNotificationSystem brukes internt <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>klasse.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>

trans-unit.source: When a cache implementation runs in an ASP.NET application domain, ASP.NET implements an IFileChangeNotificationSystem interface through the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når en hurtigbuffer implementering kjøres i en ASP.NET-programdomenet, ASP.NET implementerer et grensesnitt som IFileChangeNotificationSystem via den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class detects this property and uses the ASP.NET file-change notification system to evict cache entries based on file-change notification.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>klassen oppdager denne egenskapen og bruker ASP.NET filendring Varslingssystemet til å forkaste hurtigbufferoppføringer basert på filen Endringsvarsel.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>

trans-unit.source: In non-ASP.NET applications, there is no host environment that implements a custom IFileChangeNotificationSystem interface.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen vertsmiljøet som implementerer grensesnittet en egendefinert IFileChangeNotificationSystem i ikke-ASP.NET-applikasjoner.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class uses the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> class of the CLR.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>klasse bruker den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>CLR-type.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> </xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>

trans-unit.source: Registers a file path to monitor with the host environment.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer en filbane overvåke med vertsmiljøet.

trans-unit.source: This method is used by custom cache objects and custom change monitors that implement the host environment's <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem> interface in order to register file paths for monitoring with the host environment.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes av egendefinerte hurtigbufferen objekter og egendefinerte endre skjermer som implementerer vertsmiljøet <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>grensesnittet for å registrere filbaner for overvåking med vertsmiljøet.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>

trans-unit.source: The StartMonitoring method is called by implementers of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem> interface in order to register a file or directory for change monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Metoden StartMonitoring kalles av implementers av den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>grensesnittet for å registrere en fil eller mappe for overvåking av endringen.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem>

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified physical path of a directory or file to monitor for changes.
trans-unit.target: Den fullstendige fysiske banen til mappen eller filen til å overvåke for endringer.

trans-unit.source: A reference to a method that implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback"></xref> delegate.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til en metode som implementerer den <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback"> </xref> delegere.

trans-unit.source: When the monitored file or directory changes, the host environment's implementation of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem"></xref> interface raises an event by calling the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Når overvåket filen eller mappen endres, den vertsmiljøet implementering av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem"> </xref> grensesnittet opphøyer en hendelse ved å kalle den <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The state that is supplied by the host environment.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden som er oppgitt av vertsmiljøet.

trans-unit.source: Cache implementations and custom change monitors should treat the state value as opaque.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferen implementeringer og egendefinerte endre skjermer må behandle tilstand-verdien som ugjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: However, the state must be stored so that it can be sent to the host environment when the cache implementation calls the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StopMonitoring*> method.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid tilstanden må lagres slik at det kan sendes til vertsmiljøet når hurtigbufferen implementeringen kaller den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StopMonitoring*>metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StopMonitoring*>

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the last date and time that a write operation occurred on `filePath`.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, inneholder den siste datoen og klokkeslettet da det oppstod en skriveoperasjon på `filePath`.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren sendes ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is returned from the host environment.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren er returnert fra vertsmiljøet.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the total size of the monitored `filePath`.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, inneholder den totale størrelsen på den overvåkede `filePath`.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren sendes ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is returned from the host environment.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren er returnert fra vertsmiljøet.

trans-unit.source: Ends change monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Endene endre overvåking.

trans-unit.source: The StopMonitoring method must be called by custom caches and custom change monitors that are being disposed by the host environment in order to stop monitoring file paths and directories.
trans-unit.target: StopMonitoring-metoden må kalles av egendefinerte buffere og egendefinerte endre skjermer som er fjernet av vertsmiljøet for å slutte å overvåke filbaner og mapper.

trans-unit.source: The path of the file or folder to stop monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Banen til filen eller mappen ikke lenger overvåking.

trans-unit.source: This should match a file path value that was passed in an earlier call to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring*> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette må samsvare med en verdi for fil-banen som ble sendt i en tidligere kall til den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring*>metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring*>

trans-unit.source: The state information that was originally supplied by the host environment during an earlier call to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring*> method.
trans-unit.target: Tilstandsinformasjon som opprinnelig ble levert av vertsmiljøet under en tidligere kall til den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring*>metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IFileChangeNotificationSystem.StartMonitoring*>
